title.en: Anker 737 GaN Prime Fast Charger 120W Review

content.en: The Anker 737 GaN Prime Fast Charger 120W is part of our in-depth review series. We tested its performance, build quality, and value for money.

en: Could be improved in some areas

verdict.en: The Anker 737 GaN Prime Fast Charger 120W is a solid choice for remote workers.
verdict.fr: L’Anker 737 GaN Prime Fast Charger 120W est un excellent choix pour les télétravailleurs.
